definition: nib/pen point/the tip of a writing brush or pencil
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: The brushes have bristles of animal hair, with a very fine point.
sentences.chinese: 毛笔用动物的毛发制成，笔尖很细。

sentences.english: Penne Pasta, Zucchini, Bacon, Tomato Sauce.
sentences.chinese: 意式笔尖面，节瓜，培根，番茄汁。

sentences.english: The nib is in white gold and is rhodium-plated.
sentences.chinese: 笔尖为白金且为铑被镀。

sentences.english: It is a print of from a tip of stock across?
sentences.chinese: 是从笔尖划过的一条印子吗？

sentences.english: A penholder and its pen point.
sentences.chinese: 笔尖或有固定种类的钢笔尖。

sentences.english: A penholder and its pen point.
sentences.chinese: 笔尖或有固定种类的钢笔尖。

sentences.english: The pencil tapers to a sharp point.
The knurled all aluminum body allows the tips to be easily changed without the use of tools.
sentences.chinese: 凸边的整个铝体可以不使用工具，轻易地更换笔尖。

sentences.english: The nib is broken, it can't be used.
The tip of the pencil breaks against the bright paper.
sentences.chinese: 铅笔尖把那张亮白的纸弄得狼藉一片。

sentences.english: One key variable is how stiff or flexible the nib is to be.
sentences.chinese: 笔尖的软硬是非常重要的一个参数。

sentences.english: He is clean shaven, with a pencil-thin moustache.
sentences.chinese: 他的面颊刮的很干净，留着笔尖形的小胡子。

sentences.english: Swaying dance in nib, is the most strong touch of red spotlight.
sentences.chinese: 摇曳在笔尖的舞姿，是聚光灯下最浓烈的一抹艳红。

sentences.english: Using a felt pen, place a small mark where the left and right seat tubes should be situated.
sentences.chinese: 使用一个笔尖，放置一个小标志在左，右座管应该设。

sentences.english: Your true feelings will be outpouring on it when you doodled at a paper.
sentences.chinese: 当笔尖划过纸张，你的真情实感也会流露其中。

definition: ability to write/writing skill/written/in written form
the shaft of a pen or writing brush/pen-holder/pen
to put pen to paper/pen mark
the tip of a writing brush/vigor of style in writing/stroke/touch
fine writing paper, originally from Jing county 涇縣|泾县, Xuancheng 宣城, Anhui
